slim_seo.title: PARTYOF2 - The Drake
slim_seo.description: PARTYOF2 welcome everyone to their table. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you’ve been, or when you got there. The group’s hybrid of R&B, hip-hop, rock, trap, and alternative is just as inclusive as their core ethos is. The Los Angeles group—Jadagrace and SWIM—architect the kinds of anthems that make you feel like you’re a part of something bigger, emboldening you with bangers in the process. They’re not simply creating music; they’re creating a community. 15 years ago, Jadagrace and SWIM forged a rock-solid friendship as they respectively pursued their dreams. Eventually, they unlocked once-in-a-lifetime chemistry during their time together in grouptherapy, releasing a string of projects, collaborating with Tinashe and Rejjie Snow, and performing to packed houses. They expanded on this foundation by introducing PARTYOF2 to the masses in early 2025. Right out of the gate, the pair struck a chord with the we owe you an explanation EP. Inciting tastemaker applause from the likes of CLASH, Earmilk, UPROXX, and many others, office raved, “Through bursts of saturated color and their own poetic, quick-fire lyricism, they’re crafting a space where sharp social observations and pure sonic joy can co-exist,” and Teen Vogue went as far as to hail it as “their best music yet.” Simultaneously, “POSER” popped off to the tune of 10 million-plus Spotify streams. Rallying an ardent audience behind them, generating tens of millions of streams, and receive widespread praise, the duo invite any and all listeners into their circle with their 2025 full-length debut LP, AMERIKA’S NEXT TOP PARTY [Def Jam Recordings].
